content:
# The Stone Furnace is now fueled with 5 coal, but it still has no ingredients to smelt, resulting in a "NO_INGREDIENTS" status. 

# To make use of the furnace, I need to gather some ore to smelt into plates. Since I currently have coal, I can look for Iron Ore or Copper Ore nearby.

# I will locate the nearest Iron Ore resource and gather some.

iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)  # Locate the nearest Iron Ore resource
move_to(iron_ore_position)  # Move to the Iron Ore resource location
harvest_resource(iron_ore_position, quantity=10)  # Gather some Iron Ore
print(f"Inventory after gathering Iron Ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after gathering Iron Ore
